com.github.moribund.graphics.fonts

Class FontContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.graphics.fonts.FontContainer

  • public class FontContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    The FontContainer class contains BitmapFonts.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2ObjectMap<FontFile,com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont> fontForFile
      A Object2ObjectOpenHashMap that contains all the BitmapFonts in relation to their FontFile.
      private static FontContainer instance
      The singleton instance of this container.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont getFont(FontFile file)
      Gets the respective BitmapFont made using the data in FontFile.
      void setup()
      Sets up the fontForFile looping through every FontFile value and using its FontFile.fontFilePath and FontFile.pngFilePath to create a BitmapFont

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Sets up the fontForFile looping through every FontFile value and using its FontFile.fontFilePath and FontFile.pngFilePath to create a BitmapFont

        Returns:
